original_title: Ábalos, una historia de cinco hermanos
overview: Documentary about a classic Argentinian folklore group.
tagline: A portrait of the legendary bombist in the final stage of his life. Vitillo Abalos, member of the legendary Argentine folkloric quintet, Hermanos Abalos, embarks on a musical adventure that will become his last legacy.
title: Ábalos, A Five Brothers Tale
